title: 9 Pictures Of Spring’s Biggest Trend, At Amazon India Fashion Week, On Different Indian Body Types
text:
facebook 
Yesterday concluded the first day of the ongoing Amazon India fashion Week Autumn/Winter 2017. It was also concluded, by the frequenting fashion peeps, that the biggest share of spring trend has been claimed by stripes… pinstripes, to be precise. The bigger and bolder versions have been debuted by Bollywood’s best dressed in the past. However, the street interpretation is a tad pared-down, appearing in parts on Indian textiles (silks and alike). 
It isn’t exactly a secret that stripes have the tendency to throw off the most fashionably-certain. The eternal conundrum of going horizontal or vertical engulfs most sartorially sound minds. Which is why we went about scouting the fashion week for distinctive body types, and the varying pattern in which stripes had been styled on them. Here’s looking at eight women who have striped out their territory on this trend just about right. 1.On a languid, long shirt 2.On a ruffled thigh-grazing dress 3.On cool-girl breathable separates (these are two women) 4.On a kaftan-inspired dress 5.On a shirt dress flanked by side slits 6.On a flutter-sleeve, featuring tucked-in top 7.Both, on a diaphanous shirt and an asymmetrical top 8.On an androgynous shirt Picture Credits : Karan Torani
